description:
cmd/vet: isolate the type checking code into a separate file
We can enable/disable type checking with a build tag.
Should simplify cutting the go1.1 distribution free of go/types.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=cc7ea3466884 ***

cmd/vet: isolate the type checking code into a separate file
We can enable/disable type checking with a build tag.
Should simplify cutting the go1.1 distribution free of go/types.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7482045

subject: code review 7482045: cmd/vet: isolate the type checking code into a separate file
